The IBM watsonx.governance platform provides tools for monitoring critical asset metrics such as drift, fairness, and bias. Before diving into implementation, the next section will briefly review the different kinds of metrics that can be utilized during lifecycle governance with watsonx.governance. 6.2 Metrics in watsonx.governance The metrics in this section are by no means exhaustive and watsonx.governance is capable of implementing custom monitors and metrics based on user needs. The ability to add custom monitors and metrics sets watsonx.governance apart from its competitors in the market.
